header.notice: Jesktop documentation is under construction. Everything you can find outside this page is to be considered obsolete.

s1.title: Contacting us.
s1.p: We have two mail list. At the moment they are hosted through Yahoo groups (formerly known as egroups.com). If they prove to be slow, we'll move elsewhere.

s2.title: Announcements
s2.p: For people only wanting infrequent news about Jesktop releases etc.
Send and email to Jesktop_Announce-subscribe@yahoogroups.com to subscribe.

s2.title: Developers
s2.p: For people interested in the developer chatter of the people developing Jesktop

Send and email to Jesktop_Developers-subscribe@yahoogroups.com to subscribe. After you've replied to the consequential email from the list server engine, you may email to Jesktop_Developers@yahoogroups.com.
